Key Match Events: Motebang Sera scored his 12th international goal
Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho will hope to achieve a giant-killing mission
Morocco have already qualified for next year's tournaments as the host
Lesotho's draw in Nigeria during a World Cup qualifier suggests they can compete even in seemingly impossible situations
Post-Match Reflections: Morocco are the overwhelming favourites in this clash
Morocco's winning run in AFCON qualifiers extends to three matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on Morocco's soil due to Lesotho's lack of an international-standard stadium
Morocco's Hakim Ziyech scored a first-half brace from the penalty spot
Morocco's Walid Regragui made a host of changes for this match
Others: Lesotho's 0-1 defeat to Morocco was their first-ever meeting between the two teams
